movies.title: Madonna, babaeng ahas
movies.plot: Merlinda is cursed by her Mother after leaving her father on his death bed to be with her rich lover. Abandoned by all she is now pregnant, destitute, and covered in boils. Merlinda gives birth in a Cave to a human daughter and a snake son. The Baby girl is named Madonna. When Madonna grows up she starts turning into a giant murderous snake. Afraid of losing her lover to the monster she is becoming, Modonna is desperate for answers. Together she and her brother she seek out a cure to their damned existence.
movies.simplePlot: Merlinda is cursed by her Mother after leaving her father on his death bed to be with her rich lover. Abandoned by all she is now pregnant, destitute, and covered in boils. Merlinda gives ...

biography.bio: Snooky Serna was born as Maria Milagros Serna. She is an actress, known for Angelito: Batang ama (2011), Hahamakin ang lahat (2016) and Poor Señorita (2016). She was previously married to Ricardo Cepeda.
biography.name: Snooky Serna

biography.bio: Eric Quizon was born on January 20, 1967 as Enrico Smith Quizon. He is an actor and director, known for Soft Hearts (1998), Juan Tamad at Mr. Shooli: Mongolian Barbecue (1991) and Langit sa piling mo (1997).
biography.name: Eric Quizon

biography.bio: Tirso Cruz III was born as Tirso Silvano Cruz III. He is an actor, known for Budoy (2011), I Heart You Pare (2011) and Trespassers (2011). He is married to Lyn Ynchausti.
biography.name: Tirso Cruz III

biography.bio: Rosemarie Gil was born on March 9, 1942 in Manila, Philippines. She is an actress, known for Burlesk Queen (1977), Shake Rattle & Roll III (1991) and Ganito kami noon... Paano kayo ngayon? (1976). She is married to Eddie Mesa.
biography.name: Rosemarie Gil

biography.bio: Luis Gonzales was born in 1928 in the Philippines as Luis Mercado. He was an actor, known for Pinagbuklod ng langit (1969), Talipandas (1958) and Condenado (1958). He was married to Vina Concepcion. He died on March 15, 2012 in Makati City, Metro Manila, Philippines.
biography.name: Luis Gonzales

biography.bio: Johnny Wilson was an actor, known for Ipagpatawad mo (1991), O! Pagsintang labis (1967) and Darigold Jamboree (1969). He died on December 30, 2003 in the Philippines.
biography.name: Johnny Wilson

biography.bio: Mario Montenegro was born as Roger Colin Macalalag. He is an actor, known for The Rites of May (1976), Kilabot sa Makiling (1959) and Rebelde (1958).
biography.name: Mario Montenegro

biography.bio: Subas Herrero was born on April 3, 1943 in Manila, Philippines as Ricardo Wright Herrero. He is known for his work on The Real Life of Pacita M. (1991), José Rizal (1998) and Pakawalan mo ako (1981). He was married to Maripaz. He died on March 14, 2013 in Rochester, New York, USA.
biography.name: Subas Herrero

biography.bio: Eddie Infante was born on December 25, 1917 in Sampaloc, Manila, Philippines as Jesus Eduardo Ferriol Infante. He is an actor and director, known for Sister Stella L. (1984), The Real Life of Pacita M. (1991) and Maestro Pajarillo (1948).
biography.name: Eddie Infante

biography.bio: Angie Rosa is an actress, known for Madonna, babaeng ahas (1991).
biography.name: Angie Rosa

biography.bio: Dante Castro is an actor, known for Pahiram ng isang umaga (1989), Sa ngalan ng pag-ibig (1995) and Relasyon (1982).
biography.name: Dante Castro

biography.bio: Odette Khan is an actress, known for One True Love (2012), Ninja Party (2015) and Gaano kadalas ang minsan? (1982).
biography.name: Odette Khan

biography.bio: Paul Salvador is an actor, known for Madonna, babaeng ahas (1991).
biography.name: Paul Salvador

biography.bio: Caridad Sanchez is an actress, known for One True Love (2012), Bagong buwan (2001) and Panaghóy sa subâ: The Call of the River (2004).
biography.name: Caridad Sanchez

biography.bio: Judy Ann Santos was born on May 11, 1978 in the Philippines as Judy Anne Lumagui Santos. She is an actress, known for Junior MasterChef: Pinoy Edition (2011), Kasal, kasali, kasalo (2006) and Ploning (2008). She has been married to Ryan Agoncillo since April 28, 2009. They have three children.
biography.name: Judy Ann Santos
